ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the ultimate showdown you never thought you wanted to see -- Commander Adam Archer vs. America's Most Cherished Hero, CRASHMAN! But, deep down, you know you've been craving it, right? Well, we aim to please ... you've come to get your GODLAND fix, and we're happy to be your cosmic corner dealer! The outcome of this catastrophic confrontation will serve up heaping helpings of both shock and awe!
FIGHT! FIGHT! FIGHT COMIX ARE BACK!
ComicInfo.Title: Dance Hall, Crash Hall
